items.summary: Update backend message storage so each collected user submission has a stable unique identifier and can be listed by the admin with its id, stored message text, and timestamp (using the existing username/password admin gate: adminId="Bharat1213", password="bharatranjan1213").
Add backend admin APIs to delete collected user submissions by id (and optionally delete all submissions), protected by the same existing admin username/password check.
Expand the Admin page (/admin) to display all collected user submissions using the new backend message list (show at minimum timestamp + submission content; keep user-facing text in English).
Add delete controls to the Admin dashboard so the admin can delete individual collected submissions from the UI, with a confirmation step, and the UI refreshes after deletion.
Update React Query hooks to support fetching the admin submission list with ids and performing delete mutations using the current admin session stored in sessionStorage.
Add/adjust i18n English strings used by the Admin dashboard for delete actions and confirmation prompts (do not mention Internet Identity).
